mapper.update:
update WH_CHECK_POINT
WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CP_NAME = #{cpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

NOMATCH_TICKETS = #{nomatchTickets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOMATCH_AMOUNT = #{nomatchAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CP_ADMIN = #{cpAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CP_DATE = #{cpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where CP_NO = #{cpNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
